headline: Colgate-Palmolive CEO Sale Sparks Questions On Growth Outlook And Guidance
summary: Colgate-Palmolive CEO Noel Wallace recently sold more than 45,000 shares of NYSE:CL. The transaction involves the company’s top executive and has drawn attention to insider activity at the consumer products group. Investors are assessing what this sale might imply for sentiment around Colgate-Palmolive’s future direction. For context, Colgate-Palmolive shares last closed at $94.16, with the stock up 2.5% over the past week and 15.6% over the past 30 days. The company has also posted returns...
